Reviews.Title: Takes time to take the picture
Reviews.Author: Locke
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, but you have to hold the button down for a second or two before it actually takes the picture. I got the camera to take pictures of my constantly moving children. Very frustrating for everyone when the camera takes forever to take the shot.

Reviews.Title: Ok package.
Reviews.Author: Niala
Reviews.Content: A good deal with the time lapse between shots can be unnerving. Good for beginners and landscape shots. Not for action pictures.
